articles.title: RESTORING TRUTH AND SANITY TO AMERICAN HISTORY - The White House
articles.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1.
articles.content:

articles.title: 5 injured, including 2 Americans, in stabbing attack in Amsterdam, police say - CBS News
articles.description: Authorities said that no motive had been established for the stabbing attack in Amsterdam that injured five people.
articles.content: AMSTERDAM — A knife-wielding assailant in Amsterdam seriously wounded five people — including two from the United States, one from Belgium and one from Poland — in a stabbing attack Thursday on a bus… [+1567 chars]
